description:
It's orgy time again...or shall we say initiation time once again.

Who's the initiate? None other than the sexy 23 year old Justin Ryder.

Justin, Phenix Saint, Patrick Kennedy & DJ were having a slumber party. When the guys noticed Justin get up and head into the shower the next morning, they figured it was the perfect time to break the new guy in.

First they get him in the shower, sucking his cock and making out with him, and then the trio grabs Justin by the arm to lead him into the living room where an absolutely wonderful fuck fest occurs. At the end of the scene, all these sexy young men are covered in cum and Justin now knows what it's like to be a Next Door Buddy.

Enjoy!
title: Initiation Time
